the game can be very fun, especially with friends
you can play workshop with ur friends, or just play competitive with them, its both very fun in their own way
i highly recommend having a pre made team if u want to play the game seriously and actually rank up, solo queueing can be very annoying and most likely will get u a bad rank

so the game is fun with friends, and can sometimes be fun with randoms (if they have working microphones)
